                                  <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/tag/tr04v9d/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210007','type':'tag','tag':'券频道收录'});sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'本文收录在','sub_model_name':'tag','button_name':'券频道收录'})">
